attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NICK ELLIS HAS SERVED THE COMMUNITY VERY WELL FOR THE LAST 30 YEARS AND DESERVES ONE AS EVERYONE IN ST ALBANS WILL AGREE

rejection.details: You need to: add more detail as to why this should happen and also re-submit your petition without all the CAPITALS as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
